00028 #ifndef _QICSWIDGETCELLDISPLAY_H
00029 #define _QICSWIDGETCELLDISPLAY_H
00030 
00031 #include <QicsCellDisplay.h>
00032 
00033 #include <qwidget.h>
00034 #include <qpainter.h>
00035 
00036 class QicsDataItem;
00037 
00038 
00046 class QicsWidgetCellDisplay: public QicsCellDisplay {
00047 public:
00051     QicsWidgetCellDisplay(QWidget *widget);
00052 
00056     virtual ~QicsWidgetCellDisplay();
00057 
00061     virtual void displayCell(QicsGrid *, int row, int col,
00062                  const QicsDataItem *itm, const QRect &rect,
00063                  QPainter *painter);
00064 
00069     inline virtual void startEdit(QicsScreenGrid *, int, int,
00070                   const QicsDataItem *) {;}
00071 
00076     inline virtual void moveEdit(QicsScreenGrid *, int, int, const QRect &) {;}
00077 
00078     inline virtual void hideEdit(QicsScreenGrid *) { myWidget->hide(); }
00079 
00083     inline virtual void endEdit(QicsScreenGrid *, int, int) {;}
00084 
00085     virtual QSize sizeHint(QicsGrid *grid, int row, int col,
00086                const QicsDataItem *itm);
00087 
00088     inline virtual bool editWhenCurrent(void) const { return false; }
00089 
00090     inline virtual bool needsVisibilityNotification(void) const { return true; }
00091 
00092     inline virtual bool isEmpty(QicsGridInfo *, int, int,
00093                 const QicsDataItem *) const
00094     { return false; }
00095 
00096 protected:
00098     QWidget *myWidget;
00099 };
00100 
00101 #endif /* _QICSWIDGETCELLDISPLAY_H */
